name: Cave Confectioner
description:
Cave Confectioner is a back-to-the-land farming and cooking game. Get to know the savages and sell them every sweet confection you can contrive, and be aware of their individual predilections, like lactose intolerance and love of sugar.

Features

  • Tear through kilometers of wild plants
  • Solve puzzles
  • Craft foodstuffs
  • Learn what people like and distribute foodstuffs accordingly
